description: Verify the security-fix skill correctly parses scoring output, prioritizes, fixes, and re-scores.

tests.name: Accept Scoring Input
tests.prompt: Run security-fix with the scorecard as input
tests.setup: Provide a security-scoring scorecard with 8 issues across Input Validation, CSP, Webhooks, Monitoring.
expectations: Run security-fix with the scorecard as input
Verify skill parses all 8 issues with correct severity and category
Verify skill identifies the weighted score and grade
tests.pass_criteria: All issues extracted. No issue lost or duplicated.

tests.name: Fix in Severity Order
tests.prompt: Run security-fix and observe fix application order
tests.setup: Scorecard contains CRITICAL (no input validation on API routes), HIGH (missing CSP headers), MEDIUM (no request IDs in logs).
tests.pass_criteria: Input validation fixed first (CRITICAL), then CSP headers (HIGH, CSP 12% weight), then request IDs (MEDIUM). No MEDIUM fix applied before all HIGH items resolved.

tests.name: Fix References Correct Pattern
tests.prompt: Run security-fix and check which reference file the skill loads
expectations: Check which reference file the skill loads
tests.pass_criteria: Skill loads `references/fix-patterns/input-secrets.md` and applies the "Add Zod Validation to API Route" pattern. Fix adds `schema.safeParse(body)` with `.strict()` to route handlers.

tests.name: Verification Step Confirms Fix
tests.prompt: Run security-fix to apply the CSP Directives fix and verify headers are correct
expectations: Run security-fix to apply the fix
Check that skill verifies: CSP header present on responses, no unsafe-eval in script-src, frame-ancestors set to 'none'
tests.pass_criteria: Skill confirms Content-Security-Policy header added to proxy. Reports verification result before moving to next fix.

tests.name: Re-Score Shows Improvement
tests.prompt: Run security-fix through full cycle and compare before/after scores
tests.setup: Initial score 48/100 (grade D+). Apply fixes for 3 CRITICAL + 3 HIGH issues.
tests.pass_criteria: Re-score produces a higher weighted score. Each fixed category shows improvement. Final grade is at least B+. Report uses `assets/templates/fix-report.md.template` format.
